answers.answer: I'm so sorry hun I hope you get your answers soon and that in the end baby and you are good
Thank you for reading. Sometimes it just feels good to be heard.
Hope you get some answers tomorrow and a solution for the problem. Gud luck to you and baby!
I hope you get some good, helpful answers, thinking of you and your little boy, and hoping you get better soon!
I'm sorry your going through this. I can't imagine how hard it must be .. hopefully u find the answers and everything works out
I'm sorry your going through this. I can't imagine how hard it must be .. hopefully u find the answers and everything works out

I hope things get better for u and u and ur son r ok. my friend went thru something like this and they had to do an immediate c section bc the womb was seperating from the walls of her stomach....I hope that don't happen and everything is ok good luck to u

I hope you get your answers soon...your a strong person for dealing with all of this....I'll keep you and your little baby in my prays...keep us updated with answers....good luck and don't let it get you down.
Have you been tested for preeclampsia? Im sorry you are going through such a hard time. Stay strong and i hope you get some answers soon. My thoughts and prayers are with you. Sending you big hugs.

I just want to say thank you to everyone for taking the time to read my post and all of your guys wonderful comments and concerns. I have been having trouble dealing with this, and it really helps to get this off my chest and for you all to respond. Thank again. I have been tested for pre-eclampsia and it doesnt seem as though i have it. My obgyn thinks i have a seizure disorder, it just takes awhile to diagnose.
): im sorry you going thru that i hope you have answers and solutions by tomorrow keep us updated hun.

question: Approx. 3 weeks ago i started having strange symptoms.. As these symptoms progressed i started having body tremors and seizures. I've never had these before now, i am currently 26 weeks pregnant and i have been having tremors all day, along with body aches that are indescribable. Last night during dinner i started having a seizure and  felt as though i was a ball of tension that was going to explode. I went on to have 3 seizures last night, and afterward i got extremely upset and my body seemed to be falling apart. These symptoms make me feel terrible, i went for an E.E.G and should receive the answers tomorrow, however i can't help but to feel as though my body is giving up on me. Along with these seizures i started having more migraines and floaters. These symptoms have worsened and as i was sitting in a college orientation today i started having tremors and they turned off one set of lights and i felt as though i was gonna have a seizure. Thank god i didn't, i thought of my little guy and started to feel a bit better. These tremors upset me and make me wanna cry if i am in front of other people, i can't help but worry about my little guy who is growing inside of me. I try to relax but sometimes it seems to be the farthest thing from me. Thanks to all that took the time to read this, it's hard to talk to my family about this because they seem to be extremely worried about me and little Hayden.
title: Hoping for awnsers.... More of a vent.
